participant_1.name: Arjun
participant_1.personality: Arjun is a passionate and adventurous individual. He values creativity and enjoys exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: i am studying to be a computer programmer. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my favorite music genre is death metal. my family and i are from india.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Maya is friendly and outgoing, with a love for fun and games. She enjoys connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_2.background: i love to play board games. my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.

content.text: Hey! How is your day? I like to swim and play sports
